00044 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00045 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00046 #include "console.h"
00047 #include "conrpc.h"
00048 
00049 #define LST_NODE_STATE_COUNTER(nd, p)                   \
00050 do {                                                    \
00051         if ((nd)->nd_state == LST_NODE_ACTIVE)          \
00052                 (p)->nle_nactive ++;                    \
00053         else if ((nd)->nd_state == LST_NODE_BUSY)       \
00054                 (p)->nle_nbusy ++;                      \
00055         else if ((nd)->nd_state == LST_NODE_DOWN)       \
00056                 (p)->nle_ndown ++;                      \
00057         else                                            \
00058                 (p)->nle_nunknown ++;                   \
00059         (p)->nle_nnode ++;                              \
00060 } while (0)
00061 
00062 lstcon_session_t        console_session;
00063 
00064 static void
00065 lstcon_node_get(lstcon_node_t *nd)
00066 {
00067         LASSERT (nd->nd_ref >= 1);
00068 
00069         nd->nd_ref++;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static int
00073 lstcon_node_find(lnet_process_id_t id, lstcon_node_t **ndpp, int create)
00074 {
00075         lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl;
00076         unsigned int     idx = LNET_NIDADDR(id.nid) % LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE;
00077 
00078         LASSERT(id.nid != LNET_NID_ANY);
00079 
00080         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &console_session.ses_ndl_hash[idx],
00081                             ndl_hlink) {
00082                 if (ndl->ndl_node->nd_id.nid != id.nid ||
00083                     ndl->ndl_node->nd_id.pid != id.pid)
00084                         continue;
00085 
00086                 lstcon_node_get(ndl->ndl_node);
00087                 *ndpp = ndl->ndl_node;
00088                 return 0;
00089         }
00090 
00091         if (!create)
00092                 return -ENOENT;
00093 
00094         LIBCFS_ALLOC(*ndpp, sizeof(lstcon_node_t) + sizeof(lstcon_ndlink_t));
00095         if (*ndpp == NULL)
00096                 return -ENOMEM;
00097 
00098         ndl = (lstcon_ndlink_t *)(*ndpp + 1);
00099 
00100         ndl->ndl_node = *ndpp;
00101 
00102         ndl->ndl_node->nd_ref   = 1;
00103         ndl->ndl_node->nd_id    = id;
00104         ndl->ndl_node->nd_stamp = cfs_time_current();
00105         ndl->ndl_node->nd_state = LST_NODE_UNKNOWN;
00106         ndl->ndl_node->nd_timeout = 0;
00107         memset(&ndl->ndl_node->nd_ping, 0, sizeof(lstcon_rpc_t));
00108 
00109         /* queued in global hash & list, no refcount is taken by
00110          * global hash & list, if caller release his refcount,
00111          * node will be released */
00112         list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_hlink, &console_session.ses_ndl_hash[idx]);
00113         list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_link, &console_session.ses_ndl_list);
00114 
00115         return 0;
00116 }
00117 
00118 static void
00119 lstcon_node_put(lstcon_node_t *nd)
00120 {
00121         lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl;
00122 
00123         LASSERT(nd->nd_ref > 0);
00124 
00125         if (--nd->nd_ref > 0)
00126                 return;
00127 
00128         ndl = (lstcon_ndlink_t *)(nd + 1);
00129 
00130         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ndl->ndl_link));
00131         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ndl->ndl_hlink));
00132 
00133         /* remove from session */
00134         list_del(&ndl->ndl_link);
00135         list_del(&ndl->ndl_hlink);
00136 
00137         LIBCFS_FREE(nd, sizeof(lstcon_node_t) + sizeof(lstcon_ndlink_t));
00138 }
00139 
00140 static int
00141 lstcon_ndlink_find(struct list_head *hash,
00142                    lnet_process_id_t id, lstcon_ndlink_t **ndlpp, int create)
00143 {
00144         unsigned int     idx = LNET_NIDADDR(id.nid) % LST_NODE_HASHSIZE;
00145         lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl;
00146         lstcon_node_t   *nd;
00147         int              rc;
00148 
00149         if (id.nid == LNET_NID_ANY)
00150                 return -EINVAL;
00151 
00152         /* search in hash */
00153         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &hash[idx], ndl_hlink) {
00154                 if (ndl->ndl_node->nd_id.nid != id.nid ||
00155                     ndl->ndl_node->nd_id.pid != id.pid)
00156                         continue;
00157 
00158                 *ndlpp = ndl;
00159                 return 0;
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (create == 0)
00163                 return -ENOENT;
00164 
00165         /* find or create in session hash */
00166         rc = lstcon_node_find(id, &nd, (create == 1) ? 1 : 0);
00167         if (rc != 0)
00168                 return rc;
00169 
00170         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ndl, sizeof(lstcon_ndlink_t));
00171         if (ndl == NULL) {
00172                 lstcon_node_put(nd);
00173                 return -ENOMEM;
00174         }
00175 
00176         *ndlpp = ndl;
00177 
00178         ndl->ndl_node = nd;
00179         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ndl->ndl_link);
00180         list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_hlink, &hash[idx]);
00181 
00182         return 0;
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void
00186 lstcon_ndlink_release(lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl)
00187 {
00188         LASSERT(list_empty(&ndl->ndl_link));
00189         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ndl->ndl_hlink));
00190 
00191         list_del(&ndl->ndl_hlink); /* delete from hash */
00192         lstcon_node_put(ndl->ndl_node);
00193 
00194         LIBCFS_FREE(ndl, sizeof(*ndl));
00195 }
00196 
00197 static int
00198 lstcon_group_alloc(char *name, lstcon_group_t **grpp)
00199 {
00200         lstcon_group_t *grp;
00201         int             i;
00202 
00203         LIBCFS_ALLOC(grp, offsetof(lstcon_group_t,
00204                                    grp_ndl_hash[LST_NODE_HASHSIZE]));
00205         if (grp == NULL)
00206                 return -ENOMEM;
00207 
00208         grp->grp_ref = 1;
00209         if (name != NULL) {
00210                 if (strlen(name) > sizeof(grp->grp_name)-1) {
00211                         LIBCFS_FREE(grp, offsetof(lstcon_group_t,
00212                                           grp_ndl_hash[LST_NODE_HASHSIZE]));
00213                         return -E2BIG;
00214                 }
00215                 strncpy(grp->grp_name, name, sizeof(grp->grp_name));
00216         }
00217 
00218         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&grp->grp_link);
00219         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&grp->grp_ndl_list);
00220         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&grp->grp_trans_list);
00221 
00222         for (i = 0; i < LST_NODE_HASHSIZE; i++)
00223                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&grp->grp_ndl_hash[i]);
00224 
00225         *grpp = grp;
00226 
00227         return 0;
00228 }
00229 
00230 static void
00231 lstcon_group_addref(lstcon_group_t *grp)
00232 {
00233         grp->grp_ref++;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static void lstcon_group_ndlink_release(lstcon_group_t *, lstcon_ndlink_t *);
00237 
00238 static void
00239 lstcon_group_drain(lstcon_group_t *grp, int keep)
00240 {
00241         lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl;
00242         lstcon_ndlink_t *tmp;
00243 
00244         list_for_each_entry_safe(ndl, tmp, &grp->grp_ndl_list, ndl_link) {
00245                 if ((ndl->ndl_node->nd_state & keep) == 0)
00246                         lstcon_group_ndlink_release(grp, ndl);
00247         }
00248 }
00249 
00250 static void
00251 lstcon_group_decref(lstcon_group_t *grp)
00252 {
00253         int i;
00254 
00255         if (--grp->grp_ref > 0)
00256                 return;
00257 
00258         if (!list_empty(&grp->grp_link))
00259                 list_del(&grp->grp_link);
00260 
00261         lstcon_group_drain(grp, 0);
00262 
00263         for (i = 0; i < LST_NODE_HASHSIZE; i++)
00264                 LASSERT(list_empty(&grp->grp_ndl_hash[i]));
00265 
00266         LIBCFS_FREE(grp, offsetof(lstcon_group_t,
00267                                   grp_ndl_hash[LST_NODE_HASHSIZE]));
00268 }
00269 
00270 static int
00271 lstcon_group_find(const char *name, lstcon_group_t **grpp)
00272 {
00273         lstcon_group_t *grp;
00274 
00275         list_for_each_entry(grp, &console_session.ses_grp_list, grp_link) {
00276                 if (strncmp(grp->grp_name, name, LST_NAME_SIZE) != 0)
00277                         continue;
00278 
00279                 lstcon_group_addref(grp);  /* +1 ref for caller */
00280                 *grpp = grp;
00281                 return 0;
00282         }
00283 
00284         return -ENOENT;
00285 }
00286 
00287 static int
00288 lstcon_group_ndlink_find(lstcon_group_t *grp, lnet_process_id_t id,
00289                          lstcon_ndlink_t **ndlpp, int create)
00290 {
00291         int rc;
00292 
00293         rc = lstcon_ndlink_find(&grp->grp_ndl_hash[0], id, ndlpp, create);
00294         if (rc != 0)
00295                 return rc;
00296 
00297         if (!list_empty(&(*ndlpp)->ndl_link))
00298                 return 0;
00299 
00300         list_add_tail(&(*ndlpp)->ndl_link, &grp->grp_ndl_list);
00301         grp->grp_nnode++;
00302 
00303         return 0;
00304 }
00305 
00306 static void
00307 lstcon_group_ndlink_release(lstcon_group_t *grp, lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl)
00308 {
00309         list_del_init(&ndl->ndl_link);
00310         lstcon_ndlink_release(ndl);
00311         grp->grp_nnode--;
00312 }
00313 
00314 static void
00315 lstcon_group_ndlink_move(lstcon_group_t *old,
00316                          lstcon_group_t *new, lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl)
00317 {
00318         unsigned int idx = LNET_NIDADDR(ndl->ndl_node->nd_id.nid) %
00319                                         LST_NODE_HASHSIZE;
00320 
00321         list_del(&ndl->ndl_hlink);
00322         list_del(&ndl->ndl_link);
00323         old->grp_nnode--;
00324 
00325         list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_hlink, &new->grp_ndl_hash[idx]);
00326         list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_link, &new->grp_ndl_list);
00327         new->grp_nnode++;
00328 
00329         return;
00330 }
00331 
00332 static void
00333 lstcon_group_move(lstcon_group_t *old, lstcon_group_t *new)
00334 {
00335         lstcon_ndlink_t *ndl;
00336 
00337         while (!list_empty(&old->grp_ndl_list)) {
00338                 ndl = list_entry(old->grp_ndl_list.next,
00339                                  lstcon_ndlink_t, ndl_link);
00340                 lstcon_group_ndlink_move(old, new, ndl);
00341         }
00342 }
00343 
00344 static int
00345 lstcon_sesrpc_condition(int transop, lstcon_node_t *nd, void *arg)
00346 {
00347         lstcon_group_t *grp = (lstcon_group_t *)arg;
00348 
00349         switch (transop) {
00350         case LST_TRANS_SESNEW:
00351                 if (nd->nd_state == LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
00352                         return 0;
00353                 break;
00354 
00355         case LST_TRANS_SESEND:
00356                 if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
00357                         return 0;
00358 
00359                 if (grp != NULL && nd->nd_ref > 1)
00360                         return 0;
00361                 break;
00362 
00363         case LST_TRANS_SESQRY:
00364                 break;
00365 
00366         default:
00367                 LBUG();
00368         }
00369 
00370         return 1;
00371 }
00372 
00373 static int
00374 lstcon_sesrpc_readent(int transop, srpc_msg_t *msg,
00375                       lstcon_rpc_ent_t __user *ent_up)
00376 {
00377         srpc_debug_reply_t *rep;
00378 
00379         switch (transop) {
00380         case LST_TRANS_SESNEW:
00381         case LST_TRANS_SESEND:
00382                 return 0;
00383 
00384         case LST_TRANS_SESQRY:
00385                 rep = &msg->msg_body.dbg_reply;
00386 
00387                 if (copy_to_user(&ent_up->rpe_priv[0],
00388                                      &rep->dbg_timeout, sizeof(int)) ||
00389                     copy_to_user(&ent_up->rpe_payload[0],
00390                                      &rep->dbg_name, LST_NAME_SIZE))
00391                         return -EFAULT;
00392 
00393                 return 0;
00394 
00395         default:
00396                 LBUG();
00397         }
00398 
00399         return 0;
00400 }
00401 
00402 static int
00403 lstcon_group_nodes_add(lstcon_group_t *grp,
00404                        int count, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
00405                        unsigned *featp, struct list_head __user *result_up)
00406 {
00407         lstcon_rpc_trans_t      *trans;
00408         lstcon_ndlink_t         *ndl;
00409         lstcon_group_t          *tmp;
00410         lnet_process_id_t        id;
00411         int                      i;
00412         int                      rc;
00413 
00414         rc = lstcon_group_alloc(NULL, &tmp);
00415         if (rc != 0) {
00416                 CERROR("Out of memory\n");
00417                 return -ENOMEM;
00418         }
00419 
00420         for (i = 0 ; i < count; i++) {
00421                 if (copy_from_user(&id, &ids_up[i], sizeof(id))) {
00422                         rc = -EFAULT;
00423                         break;
00424                 }
00425 
00426                 /* skip if it's in this group already */
00427                 rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(grp, id, &ndl, 0);
00428                 if (rc == 0)
00429                         continue;
00430 
00431                 /* add to tmp group */
00432                 rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(tmp, id, &ndl, 1);
00433                 if (rc != 0) {
00434                         CERROR("Can't create ndlink, out of memory\n");
00435                         break;
00436                 }
00437         }
00438 
00439         if (rc != 0) {
00440                 lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
00441                 return rc;
00442         }
00443 
00444         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&tmp->grp_ndl_list,
00445                                      &tmp->grp_trans_list, LST_TRANS_SESNEW,
00446                                      tmp, lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
00447         if (rc != 0) {
00448                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
00449                 lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
00450                 return rc;
00451         }
00452 
00453         /* post all RPCs */
00454         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
00455 
00456         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up,
00457                                           lstcon_sesrpc_readent);
00458         *featp = trans->tas_features;
00459 
00460         /* destroy all RPGs */
00461         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
00462 
00463         lstcon_group_move(tmp, grp);
00464         lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
00465 
00466         return rc;
00467 }
00468 
00469 static int
00470 lstcon_group_nodes_remove(lstcon_group_t *grp,
00471                           int count, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
00472                           struct list_head __user *result_up)
00473 {
00474         lstcon_rpc_trans_t     *trans;
00475         lstcon_ndlink_t        *ndl;
00476         lstcon_group_t         *tmp;
00477         lnet_process_id_t       id;
00478         int                     rc;
00479         int                     i;
00480 
00481         /* End session and remove node from the group */
00482 
00483         rc = lstcon_group_alloc(NULL, &tmp);
00484         if (rc != 0) {
00485                 CERROR("Out of memory\n");
00486                 return -ENOMEM;
00487         }
00488 
00489         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00490                 if (copy_from_user(&id, &ids_up[i], sizeof(id))) {
00491                         rc = -EFAULT;
00492                         goto error;
00493                 }
00494 
00495                 /* move node to tmp group */
00496                 if (lstcon_group_ndlink_find(grp, id, &ndl, 0) == 0)
00497                         lstcon_group_ndlink_move(grp, tmp, ndl);
00498         }
00499 
00500         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&tmp->grp_ndl_list,
00501                                      &tmp->grp_trans_list, LST_TRANS_SESEND,
00502                                      tmp, lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
00503         if (rc != 0) {
00504                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
00505                 goto error;
00506         }
00507 
00508         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
00509 
00510         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up, NULL);
00511 
00512         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
00513         /* release nodes anyway, because we can't rollback status */
00514         lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
00515 
00516         return rc;
00517 error:
00518         lstcon_group_move(tmp, grp);
00519         lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
00520 
00521         return rc;
00522 }
00523 
00524 int
00525 lstcon_group_add(char *name)
00526 {
00527         lstcon_group_t *grp;
00528         int             rc;
00529 
00530         rc = (lstcon_group_find(name, &grp) == 0)? -EEXIST: 0;
00531         if (rc != 0) {
00532                 /* find a group with same name */
00533                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00534                 return rc;
00535         }
00536 
00537         rc = lstcon_group_alloc(name, &grp);
00538         if (rc != 0) {
00539                 CERROR("Can't allocate descriptor for group %s\n", name);
00540                 return -ENOMEM;
00541         }
00542 
00543         list_add_tail(&grp->grp_link, &console_session.ses_grp_list);
00544 
00545         return rc;
00546 }
00547 
00548 int
00549 lstcon_nodes_add(char *name, int count, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
00550                  unsigned *featp, struct list_head __user *result_up)
00551 {
00552         lstcon_group_t         *grp;
00553         int                     rc;
00554 
00555         LASSERT (count > 0);
00556         LASSERT (ids_up != NULL);
00557 
00558         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00559         if (rc != 0) {
00560                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group %s\n", name);
00561                 return rc;
00562         }
00563 
00564         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
00565                 /* referred by other threads or test */
00566                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s is busy\n", name);
00567                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00568 
00569                 return -EBUSY;
00570         }
00571 
00572         rc = lstcon_group_nodes_add(grp, count, ids_up, featp, result_up);
00573 
00574         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00575 
00576         return rc;
00577 }
00578 
00579 int
00580 lstcon_group_del(char *name)
00581 {
00582         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
00583         lstcon_group_t     *grp;
00584         int                 rc;
00585 
00586         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00587         if (rc != 0) {
00588                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group: %s\n", name);
00589                 return rc;
00590         }
00591 
00592         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
00593                 /* referred by others threads or test */
00594                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s is busy\n", name);
00595                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00596                 return -EBUSY;
00597         }
00598 
00599         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&grp->grp_ndl_list,
00600                                      &grp->grp_trans_list, LST_TRANS_SESEND,
00601                                      grp, lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
00602         if (rc != 0) {
00603                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
00604                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00605                 return rc;
00606         }
00607 
00608         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
00609 
00610         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
00611 
00612         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00613         /* -ref for session, it's destroyed,
00614          * status can't be rolled back, destroy group anway */
00615         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00616 
00617         return rc;
00618 }
00619 
00620 int
00621 lstcon_group_clean(char *name, int args)
00622 {
00623         lstcon_group_t *grp = NULL;
00624         int             rc;
00625 
00626         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00627         if (rc != 0) {
00628                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group %s\n", name);
00629                 return rc;
00630         }
00631 
00632         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
00633                 /* referred by test */
00634                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s is busy\n", name);
00635                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00636                 return -EBUSY;
00637         }
00638 
00639         args = (LST_NODE_ACTIVE | LST_NODE_BUSY |
00640                 LST_NODE_DOWN | LST_NODE_UNKNOWN) & ~args;
00641 
00642         lstcon_group_drain(grp, args);
00643 
00644         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00645         /* release empty group */
00646         if (list_empty(&grp->grp_ndl_list))
00647                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00648 
00649         return 0;
00650 }
00651 
00652 int
00653 lstcon_nodes_remove(char *name, int count,
00654                     lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
00655                     struct list_head __user *result_up)
00656 {
00657         lstcon_group_t *grp = NULL;
00658         int             rc;
00659 
00660         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00661         if (rc != 0) {
00662                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group: %s\n", name);
00663                 return rc;
00664         }
00665 
00666         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
00667                 /* referred by test */
00668                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s is busy\n", name);
00669                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00670                 return -EBUSY;
00671         }
00672 
00673         rc = lstcon_group_nodes_remove(grp, count, ids_up, result_up);
00674 
00675         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00676         /* release empty group */
00677         if (list_empty(&grp->grp_ndl_list))
00678                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00679 
00680         return rc;
00681 }
00682 
00683 int
00684 lstcon_group_refresh(char *name, struct list_head __user *result_up)
00685 {
00686         lstcon_rpc_trans_t      *trans;
00687         lstcon_group_t          *grp;
00688         int                      rc;
00689 
00690         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00691         if (rc != 0) {
00692                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group: %s\n", name);
00693                 return rc;
00694         }
00695 
00696         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
00697                 /* referred by test */
00698                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s is busy\n", name);
00699                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00700                 return -EBUSY;
00701         }
00702 
00703         /* re-invite all inactive nodes int the group */
00704         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&grp->grp_ndl_list,
00705                                      &grp->grp_trans_list, LST_TRANS_SESNEW,
00706                                      grp, lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
00707         if (rc != 0) {
00708                 /* local error, return */
00709                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
00710                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00711                 return rc;
00712         }
00713 
00714         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
00715 
00716         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up, NULL);
00717 
00718         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
00719         /* -ref for me */
00720         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00721 
00722         return rc;
00723 }
00724 
00725 int
00726 lstcon_group_list(int index, int len, char __user *name_up)
00727 {
00728         lstcon_group_t *grp;
00729 
00730         LASSERT(index >= 0);
00731         LASSERT(name_up != NULL);
00732 
00733         list_for_each_entry(grp, &console_session.ses_grp_list, grp_link) {
00734                 if (index-- == 0) {
00735                         return copy_to_user(name_up, grp->grp_name, len) ?
00736                                             -EFAULT : 0;
00737                 }
00738         }
00739 
00740         return -ENOENT;
00741 }
00742 
00743 static int
00744 lstcon_nodes_getent(struct list_head *head, int *index_p,
00745                     int *count_p, lstcon_node_ent_t __user *dents_up)
00746 {
00747         lstcon_ndlink_t  *ndl;
00748         lstcon_node_t    *nd;
00749         int               count = 0;
00750         int               index = 0;
00751 
00752         LASSERT(index_p != NULL && count_p != NULL);
00753         LASSERT(dents_up != NULL);
00754         LASSERT(*index_p >= 0);
00755         LASSERT(*count_p > 0);
00756 
00757         list_for_each_entry(ndl, head, ndl_link) {
00758                 if (index++ < *index_p)
00759                         continue;
00760 
00761                 if (count >= *count_p)
00762                         break;
00763 
00764                 nd = ndl->ndl_node;
00765                 if (copy_to_user(&dents_up[count].nde_id,
00766                                      &nd->nd_id, sizeof(nd->nd_id)) ||
00767                     copy_to_user(&dents_up[count].nde_state,
00768                                      &nd->nd_state, sizeof(nd->nd_state)))
00769                         return -EFAULT;
00770 
00771                 count ++;
00772         }
00773 
00774         if (index <= *index_p)
00775                 return -ENOENT;
00776 
00777         *count_p = count;
00778         *index_p = index;
00779 
00780         return 0;
00781 }
00782 
00783 int
00784 lstcon_group_info(char *name, lstcon_ndlist_ent_t __user *gents_p,
00785                   int *index_p, int *count_p,
00786                   lstcon_node_ent_t __user *dents_up)
00787 {
00788         lstcon_ndlist_ent_t *gentp;
00789         lstcon_group_t      *grp;
00790         lstcon_ndlink_t     *ndl;
00791         int                  rc;
00792 
00793         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
00794         if (rc != 0) {
00795                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group %s\n", name);
00796                 return rc;
00797         }
00798 
00799         if (dents_up != NULL) {
00800                 /* verbose query */
00801                 rc = lstcon_nodes_getent(&grp->grp_ndl_list,
00802                                          index_p, count_p, dents_up);
00803                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00804 
00805                 return rc;
00806         }
00807 
00808         /* non-verbose query */
00809         LIBCFS_ALLOC(gentp, sizeof(lstcon_ndlist_ent_t));
00810         if (gentp == NULL) {
00811                 CERROR("Can't allocate ndlist_ent\n");
00812                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00813 
00814                 return -ENOMEM;
00815         }
00816 
00817         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &grp->grp_ndl_list, ndl_link)
00818                 LST_NODE_STATE_COUNTER(ndl->ndl_node, gentp);
00819 
00820         rc = copy_to_user(gents_p, gentp,
00821                           sizeof(lstcon_ndlist_ent_t)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
00822 
00823         LIBCFS_FREE(gentp, sizeof(lstcon_ndlist_ent_t));
00824 
00825         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
00826 
00827         return 0;
00828 }
00829 
00830 static int
00831 lstcon_batch_find(const char *name, lstcon_batch_t **batpp)
00832 {
00833         lstcon_batch_t *bat;
00834 
00835         list_for_each_entry(bat, &console_session.ses_bat_list, bat_link) {
00836                 if (strncmp(bat->bat_name, name, LST_NAME_SIZE) == 0) {
00837                         *batpp = bat;
00838                         return 0;
00839                 }
00840         }
00841 
00842         return -ENOENT;
00843 }
00844 
00845 int
00846 lstcon_batch_add(char *name)
00847 {
00848         lstcon_batch_t   *bat;
00849         int               i;
00850         int               rc;
00851 
00852         rc = (lstcon_batch_find(name, &bat) == 0)? -EEXIST: 0;
00853         if (rc != 0) {
00854                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Batch %s already exists\n", name);
00855                 return rc;
00856         }
00857 
00858         LIBCFS_ALLOC(bat, sizeof(lstcon_batch_t));
00859         if (bat == NULL) {
00860                 CERROR("Can't allocate descriptor for batch %s\n", name);
00861                 return -ENOMEM;
00862         }
00863 
00864         LIBCFS_ALLOC(bat->bat_cli_hash,
00865                      sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
00866         if (bat->bat_cli_hash == NULL) {
00867                 CERROR("Can't allocate hash for batch %s\n", name);
00868                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat, sizeof(lstcon_batch_t));
00869 
00870                 return -ENOMEM;
00871         }
00872 
00873         LIBCFS_ALLOC(bat->bat_srv_hash,
00874                      sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
00875         if (bat->bat_srv_hash == NULL) {
00876                 CERROR("Can't allocate hash for batch %s\n", name);
00877                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat->bat_cli_hash, LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
00878                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat, sizeof(lstcon_batch_t));
00879 
00880                 return -ENOMEM;
00881         }
00882 
00883         if (strlen(name) > sizeof(bat->bat_name)-1) {
00884                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat->bat_srv_hash, LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
00885                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat->bat_cli_hash, LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
00886                 LIBCFS_FREE(bat, sizeof(lstcon_batch_t));
00887                 return -E2BIG;
00888         }
00889         strncpy(bat->bat_name, name, sizeof(bat->bat_name));
00890         bat->bat_hdr.tsb_index = 0;
00891         bat->bat_hdr.tsb_id.bat_id = ++console_session.ses_id_cookie;
00892 
00893         bat->bat_ntest = 0;
00894         bat->bat_state = LST_BATCH_IDLE;
00895 
00896         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_cli_list);
00897         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_srv_list);
00898         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_test_list);
00899         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_trans_list);
00900 
00901         for (i = 0; i < LST_NODE_HASHSIZE; i++) {
00902                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_cli_hash[i]);
00903                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&bat->bat_srv_hash[i]);
00904         }
00905 
00906         list_add_tail(&bat->bat_link, &console_session.ses_bat_list);
00907 
00908         return rc;
00909 }
00910 
00911 int
00912 lstcon_batch_list(int index, int len, char __user *name_up)
00913 {
00914         lstcon_batch_t *bat;
00915 
00916         LASSERT(name_up != NULL);
00917         LASSERT(index >= 0);
00918 
00919         list_for_each_entry(bat, &console_session.ses_bat_list, bat_link) {
00920                 if (index-- == 0) {
00921                         return copy_to_user(name_up, bat->bat_name, len) ?
00922                                             -EFAULT : 0;
00923                 }
00924         }
00925 
00926         return -ENOENT;
00927 }
00928 
00929 int
00930 lstcon_batch_info(char *name, lstcon_test_batch_ent_t __user *ent_up,
00931                   int server, int testidx, int *index_p, int *ndent_p,
00932                   lstcon_node_ent_t __user *dents_up)
00933 {
00934         lstcon_test_batch_ent_t *entp;
00935         struct list_head        *clilst;
00936         struct list_head        *srvlst;
00937         lstcon_test_t           *test = NULL;
00938         lstcon_batch_t          *bat;
00939         lstcon_ndlink_t         *ndl;
00940         int                      rc;
00941 
00942         rc = lstcon_batch_find(name, &bat);
00943         if (rc != 0) {
00944                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find batch %s\n", name);
00945                 return -ENOENT;
00946         }
00947 
00948         if (testidx > 0) {
00949                 /* query test, test index start from 1 */
00950                 list_for_each_entry(test, &bat->bat_test_list, tes_link) {
00951                         if (testidx-- == 1)
00952                                 break;
00953                 }
00954 
00955                 if (testidx > 0) {
00956                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find specified test in batch\n");
00957                         return -ENOENT;
00958                 }
00959         }
00960 
00961         clilst = (test == NULL) ? &bat->bat_cli_list :
00962                                   &test->tes_src_grp->grp_ndl_list;
00963         srvlst = (test == NULL) ? &bat->bat_srv_list :
00964                                   &test->tes_dst_grp->grp_ndl_list;
00965 
00966         if (dents_up != NULL) {
00967                 rc = lstcon_nodes_getent((server ? srvlst: clilst),
00968                                          index_p, ndent_p, dents_up);
00969                 return rc;
00970         }
00971 
00972         /* non-verbose query */
00973         LIBCFS_ALLOC(entp, sizeof(lstcon_test_batch_ent_t));
00974         if (entp == NULL)
00975                 return -ENOMEM;
00976 
00977         if (test == NULL) {
00978                 entp->u.tbe_batch.bae_ntest = bat->bat_ntest;
00979                 entp->u.tbe_batch.bae_state = bat->bat_state;
00980 
00981         } else {
00982 
00983                 entp->u.tbe_test.tse_type   = test->tes_type;
00984                 entp->u.tbe_test.tse_loop   = test->tes_loop;
00985                 entp->u.tbe_test.tse_concur = test->tes_concur;
00986         }
00987 
00988         list_for_each_entry(ndl, clilst, ndl_link)
00989                 LST_NODE_STATE_COUNTER(ndl->ndl_node, &entp->tbe_cli_nle);
00990 
00991         list_for_each_entry(ndl, srvlst, ndl_link)
00992                 LST_NODE_STATE_COUNTER(ndl->ndl_node, &entp->tbe_srv_nle);
00993 
00994         rc = copy_to_user(ent_up, entp,
00995                           sizeof(lstcon_test_batch_ent_t)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
00996 
00997         LIBCFS_FREE(entp, sizeof(lstcon_test_batch_ent_t));
00998 
00999         return rc;
01000 }
01001 
01002 static int
01003 lstcon_batrpc_condition(int transop, lstcon_node_t *nd, void *arg)
01004 {
01005         switch (transop) {
01006         case LST_TRANS_TSBRUN:
01007                 if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
01008                         return -ENETDOWN;
01009                 break;
01010 
01011         case LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP:
01012                 if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
01013                         return 0;
01014                 break;
01015 
01016         case LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY:
01017         case LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY:
01018                 break;
01019         }
01020 
01021         return 1;
01022 }
01023 
01024 static int
01025 lstcon_batch_op(lstcon_batch_t *bat, int transop,
01026                 struct list_head __user *result_up)
01027 {
01028         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01029         int                 rc;
01030 
01031         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&bat->bat_cli_list,
01032                                      &bat->bat_trans_list, transop,
01033                                      bat, lstcon_batrpc_condition, &trans);
01034         if (rc != 0) {
01035                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01036                 return rc;
01037         }
01038 
01039         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
01040 
01041         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up, NULL);
01042 
01043         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01044 
01045         return rc;
01046 }
01047 
01048 int
01049 lstcon_batch_run(char *name, int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01050 {
01051         lstcon_batch_t *bat;
01052         int             rc;
01053 
01054         if (lstcon_batch_find(name, &bat) != 0) {
01055                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find batch %s\n", name);
01056                 return -ENOENT;
01057         }
01058 
01059         bat->bat_arg = timeout;
01060 
01061         rc = lstcon_batch_op(bat, LST_TRANS_TSBRUN, result_up);
01062 
01063         /* mark batch as running if it's started in any node */
01064         if (lstcon_tsbop_stat_success(lstcon_trans_stat(), 0) != 0)
01065                 bat->bat_state = LST_BATCH_RUNNING;
01066 
01067         return rc;
01068 }
01069 
01070 int
01071 lstcon_batch_stop(char *name, int force, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01072 {
01073         lstcon_batch_t *bat;
01074         int             rc;
01075 
01076         if (lstcon_batch_find(name, &bat) != 0) {
01077                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find batch %s\n", name);
01078                 return -ENOENT;
01079         }
01080 
01081         bat->bat_arg = force;
01082 
01083         rc = lstcon_batch_op(bat, LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP, result_up);
01084 
01085         /* mark batch as stopped if all RPCs finished */
01086         if (lstcon_tsbop_stat_failure(lstcon_trans_stat(), 0) == 0)
01087                 bat->bat_state = LST_BATCH_IDLE;
01088 
01089         return rc;
01090 }
01091 
01092 static void
01093 lstcon_batch_destroy(lstcon_batch_t *bat)
01094 {
01095         lstcon_ndlink_t    *ndl;
01096         lstcon_test_t      *test;
01097         int                 i;
01098 
01099         list_del(&bat->bat_link);
01100 
01101         while (!list_empty(&bat->bat_test_list)) {
01102                 test = list_entry(bat->bat_test_list.next,
01103                                   lstcon_test_t, tes_link);
01104                 LASSERT(list_empty(&test->tes_trans_list));
01105 
01106                 list_del(&test->tes_link);
01107 
01108                 lstcon_group_decref(test->tes_src_grp);
01109                 lstcon_group_decref(test->tes_dst_grp);
01110 
01111                 LIBCFS_FREE(test, offsetof(lstcon_test_t,
01112                                            tes_param[test->tes_paramlen]));
01113         }
01114 
01115         LASSERT(list_empty(&bat->bat_trans_list));
01116 
01117         while (!list_empty(&bat->bat_cli_list)) {
01118                 ndl = list_entry(bat->bat_cli_list.next,
01119                                  lstcon_ndlink_t, ndl_link);
01120                 list_del_init(&ndl->ndl_link);
01121 
01122                 lstcon_ndlink_release(ndl);
01123         }
01124 
01125         while (!list_empty(&bat->bat_srv_list)) {
01126                 ndl = list_entry(bat->bat_srv_list.next,
01127                                  lstcon_ndlink_t, ndl_link);
01128                 list_del_init(&ndl->ndl_link);
01129 
01130                 lstcon_ndlink_release(ndl);
01131         }
01132 
01133         for (i = 0; i < LST_NODE_HASHSIZE; i++) {
01134                 LASSERT(list_empty(&bat->bat_cli_hash[i]));
01135                 LASSERT(list_empty(&bat->bat_srv_hash[i]));
01136         }
01137 
01138         LIBCFS_FREE(bat->bat_cli_hash,
01139                     sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
01140         LIBCFS_FREE(bat->bat_srv_hash,
01141                     sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_NODE_HASHSIZE);
01142         LIBCFS_FREE(bat, sizeof(lstcon_batch_t));
01143 }
01144 
01145 static int
01146 lstcon_testrpc_condition(int transop, lstcon_node_t *nd, void *arg)
01147 {
01148         lstcon_test_t    *test;
01149         lstcon_batch_t   *batch;
01150         lstcon_ndlink_t  *ndl;
01151         struct list_head *hash;
01152         struct list_head *head;
01153 
01154         test = (lstcon_test_t *)arg;
01155         LASSERT(test != NULL);
01156 
01157         batch = test->tes_batch;
01158         LASSERT(batch != NULL);
01159 
01160         if (test->tes_oneside &&
01161             transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD)
01162                 return 0;
01163 
01164         if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
01165                 return -ENETDOWN;
01166 
01167         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD) {
01168                 hash = batch->bat_cli_hash;
01169                 head = &batch->bat_cli_list;
01170 
01171         } else {
01172                 LASSERT (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD);
01173 
01174                 hash = batch->bat_srv_hash;
01175                 head = &batch->bat_srv_list;
01176         }
01177 
01178         LASSERT (nd->nd_id.nid != LNET_NID_ANY);
01179 
01180         if (lstcon_ndlink_find(hash, nd->nd_id, &ndl, 1) != 0)
01181                 return -ENOMEM;
01182 
01183         if (list_empty(&ndl->ndl_link))
01184                 list_add_tail(&ndl->ndl_link, head);
01185 
01186         return 1;
01187 }
01188 
01189 static int
01190 lstcon_test_nodes_add(lstcon_test_t *test, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01191 {
01192         lstcon_rpc_trans_t     *trans;
01193         lstcon_group_t         *grp;
01194         int                     transop;
01195         int                     rc;
01196 
01197         LASSERT (test->tes_src_grp != NULL);
01198         LASSERT (test->tes_dst_grp != NULL);
01199 
01200         transop = LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD;
01201         grp  = test->tes_dst_grp;
01202 again:
01203         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&grp->grp_ndl_list,
01204                                      &test->tes_trans_list, transop,
01205                                      test, lstcon_testrpc_condition, &trans);
01206         if (rc != 0) {
01207                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01208                 return rc;
01209         }
01210 
01211         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
01212 
01213         if (lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_rpc_errno != 0 ||
01214             lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_fwk_errno != 0) {
01215                 lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up, NULL);
01216 
01217                 lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01218                 /* return if any error */
01219                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Failed to add test %s, "
01220                               "RPC error %d, framework error %d\n",
01221                        transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD ? "client" : "server",
01222                        lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_rpc_errno,
01223                        lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_fwk_errno);
01224 
01225                 return rc;
01226         }
01227 
01228         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01229 
01230         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD)
01231                 return rc;
01232 
01233         transop = LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD;
01234         grp = test->tes_src_grp;
01235         test->tes_cliidx = 0;
01236 
01237         /* requests to test clients */
01238         goto again;
01239 }
01240 
01241 static int
01242 lstcon_verify_batch(const char *name, lstcon_batch_t **batch)
01243 {
01244         int rc;
01245 
01246         rc = lstcon_batch_find(name, batch);
01247         if (rc != 0) {
01248                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find batch %s\n", name);
01249                 return rc;
01250         }
01251 
01252         if ((*batch)->bat_state != LST_BATCH_IDLE) {
01253                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't change running batch %s\n", name);
01254                 return -EINVAL;
01255         }
01256 
01257         return 0;
01258 }
01259 
01260 static int
01261 lstcon_verify_group(const char *name, lstcon_group_t **grp)
01262 {
01263         int                     rc;
01264         lstcon_ndlink_t         *ndl;
01265 
01266         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, grp);
01267         if (rc != 0) {
01268                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "can't find group %s\n", name);
01269                 return rc;
01270         }
01271 
01272         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &(*grp)->grp_ndl_list, ndl_link) {
01273                 if (ndl->ndl_node->nd_state == LST_NODE_ACTIVE) {
01274                         return 0;
01275                 }
01276         }
01277 
01278         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Group %s has no ACTIVE nodes\n", name);
01279 
01280         return -EINVAL;
01281 }
01282 
01283 int
01284 lstcon_test_add(char *batch_name, int type, int loop,
01285                 int concur, int dist, int span,
01286                 char *src_name, char *dst_name,
01287                 void *param, int paramlen, int *retp,
01288                 struct list_head __user *result_up)
01289 {
01290         lstcon_test_t    *test   = NULL;
01291         int              rc;
01292         lstcon_group_t   *src_grp = NULL;
01293         lstcon_group_t   *dst_grp = NULL;
01294         lstcon_batch_t   *batch = NULL;
01295 
01296         /*
01297          * verify that a batch of the given name exists, and the groups
01298          * that will be part of the batch exist and have at least one
01299          * active node
01300          */
01301         rc = lstcon_verify_batch(batch_name, &batch);
01302         if (rc != 0)
01303                 goto out;
01304 
01305         rc = lstcon_verify_group(src_name, &src_grp);
01306         if (rc != 0)
01307                 goto out;
01308 
01309         rc = lstcon_verify_group(dst_name, &dst_grp);
01310         if (rc != 0)
01311                 goto out;
01312 
01313         if (dst_grp->grp_userland)
01314                 *retp = 1;
01315 
01316         LIBCFS_ALLOC(test, offsetof(lstcon_test_t, tes_param[paramlen]));
01317         if (!test) {
01318                 CERROR("Can't allocate test descriptor\n");
01319                 rc = -ENOMEM;
01320 
01321                 goto out;
01322         }
01323 
01324         test->tes_hdr.tsb_id    = batch->bat_hdr.tsb_id;
01325         test->tes_batch         = batch;
01326         test->tes_type          = type;
01327         test->tes_oneside       = 0; /* TODO */
01328         test->tes_loop          = loop;
01329         test->tes_concur        = concur;
01330         test->tes_stop_onerr    = 1; /* TODO */
01331         test->tes_span          = span;
01332         test->tes_dist          = dist;
01333         test->tes_cliidx        = 0; /* just used for creating RPC */
01334         test->tes_src_grp       = src_grp;
01335         test->tes_dst_grp       = dst_grp;
01336         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&test->tes_trans_list);
01337 
01338         if (param != NULL) {
01339                 test->tes_paramlen = paramlen;
01340                 memcpy(&test->tes_param[0], param, paramlen);
01341         }
01342 
01343         rc = lstcon_test_nodes_add(test, result_up);
01344 
01345         if (rc != 0)
01346                 goto out;
01347 
01348         if (lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_rpc_errno != 0 ||
01349             lstcon_trans_stat()->trs_fwk_errno != 0)
01350                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Failed to add test %d to batch %s\n", type,
01351                        batch_name);
01352 
01353         /* add to test list anyway, so user can check what's going on */
01354         list_add_tail(&test->tes_link, &batch->bat_test_list);
01355 
01356         batch->bat_ntest++;
01357         test->tes_hdr.tsb_index = batch->bat_ntest;
01358 
01359         /*  hold groups so nobody can change them */
01360         return rc;
01361 out:
01362         if (test != NULL)
01363                 LIBCFS_FREE(test, offsetof(lstcon_test_t, tes_param[paramlen]));
01364 
01365         if (dst_grp != NULL)
01366                 lstcon_group_decref(dst_grp);
01367 
01368         if (src_grp != NULL)
01369                 lstcon_group_decref(src_grp);
01370 
01371         return rc;
01372 }
01373 
01374 static int
01375 lstcon_test_find(lstcon_batch_t *batch, int idx, lstcon_test_t **testpp)
01376 {
01377         lstcon_test_t *test;
01378 
01379         list_for_each_entry(test, &batch->bat_test_list, tes_link) {
01380                 if (idx == test->tes_hdr.tsb_index) {
01381                         *testpp = test;
01382                         return 0;
01383                 }
01384         }
01385 
01386         return -ENOENT;
01387 }
01388 
01389 static int
01390 lstcon_tsbrpc_readent(int transop, srpc_msg_t *msg,
01391                       lstcon_rpc_ent_t __user *ent_up)
01392 {
01393         srpc_batch_reply_t *rep = &msg->msg_body.bat_reply;
01394 
01395         LASSERT (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY ||
01396                  transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY);
01397 
01398         /* positive errno, framework error code */
01399         if (copy_to_user(&ent_up->rpe_priv[0],
01400                              &rep->bar_active, sizeof(rep->bar_active)))
01401                 return -EFAULT;
01402 
01403         return 0;
01404 }
01405 
01406 int
01407 lstcon_test_batch_query(char *name, int testidx, int client,
01408                         int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01409 {
01410         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01411         struct list_head   *translist;
01412         struct list_head   *ndlist;
01413         lstcon_tsb_hdr_t   *hdr;
01414         lstcon_batch_t     *batch;
01415         lstcon_test_t      *test = NULL;
01416         int                 transop;
01417         int                 rc;
01418 
01419         rc = lstcon_batch_find(name, &batch);
01420         if (rc != 0) {
01421                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find batch: %s\n", name);
01422                 return rc;
01423         }
01424 
01425         if (testidx == 0) {
01426                 translist = &batch->bat_trans_list;
01427                 ndlist    = &batch->bat_cli_list;
01428                 hdr       = &batch->bat_hdr;
01429 
01430         } else {
01431                 /* query specified test only */
01432                 rc = lstcon_test_find(batch, testidx, &test);
01433                 if (rc != 0) {
01434                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find test: %d\n", testidx);
01435                         return rc;
01436                 }
01437 
01438                 translist = &test->tes_trans_list;
01439                 ndlist    = &test->tes_src_grp->grp_ndl_list;
01440                 hdr       = &test->tes_hdr;
01441         }
01442 
01443         transop = client ? LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY : LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY;
01444 
01445         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(ndlist, translist, transop, hdr,
01446                                      lstcon_batrpc_condition, &trans);
01447         if (rc != 0) {
01448                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01449                 return rc;
01450         }
01451 
01452         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, timeout);
01453 
01454         if (testidx == 0 && /* query a batch, not a test */
01455             lstcon_rpc_stat_failure(lstcon_trans_stat(), 0) == 0 &&
01456             lstcon_tsbqry_stat_run(lstcon_trans_stat(), 0) == 0) {
01457                 /* all RPCs finished, and no active test */
01458                 batch->bat_state = LST_BATCH_IDLE;
01459         }
01460 
01461         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up,
01462                                           lstcon_tsbrpc_readent);
01463         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01464 
01465         return rc;
01466 }
01467 
01468 static int
01469 lstcon_statrpc_readent(int transop, srpc_msg_t *msg,
01470                        lstcon_rpc_ent_t __user *ent_up)
01471 {
01472         srpc_stat_reply_t *rep = &msg->msg_body.stat_reply;
01473         sfw_counters_t __user  *sfwk_stat;
01474         srpc_counters_t __user *srpc_stat;
01475         lnet_counters_t __user *lnet_stat;
01476 
01477         if (rep->str_status != 0)
01478                 return 0;
01479 
01480         sfwk_stat = (sfw_counters_t __user *)&ent_up->rpe_payload[0];
01481         srpc_stat = (srpc_counters_t __user *)
01482                 ((char __user *)sfwk_stat + sizeof(*sfwk_stat));
01483         lnet_stat = (lnet_counters_t __user *)
01484                 ((char __user *)srpc_stat + sizeof(*srpc_stat));
01485 
01486         if (copy_to_user(sfwk_stat, &rep->str_fw, sizeof(*sfwk_stat)) ||
01487             copy_to_user(srpc_stat, &rep->str_rpc, sizeof(*srpc_stat)) ||
01488             copy_to_user(lnet_stat, &rep->str_lnet, sizeof(*lnet_stat)))
01489                 return -EFAULT;
01490 
01491         return 0;
01492 }
01493 
01494 static int
01495 lstcon_ndlist_stat(struct list_head *ndlist,
01496                    int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01497 {
01498         struct list_head    head;
01499         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01500         int                 rc;
01501 
01502         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&head);
01503 
01504         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(ndlist, &head,
01505                                      LST_TRANS_STATQRY, NULL, NULL, &trans);
01506         if (rc != 0) {
01507                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01508                 return rc;
01509         }
01510 
01511         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_VALIDATE_TIMEOUT(timeout));
01512 
01513         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up,
01514                                           lstcon_statrpc_readent);
01515         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01516 
01517         return rc;
01518 }
01519 
01520 int
01521 lstcon_group_stat(char *grp_name, int timeout,
01522                   struct list_head __user *result_up)
01523 {
01524         lstcon_group_t     *grp;
01525         int                 rc;
01526 
01527         rc = lstcon_group_find(grp_name, &grp);
01528         if (rc != 0) {
01529                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Can't find group %s\n", grp_name);
01530                 return rc;
01531         }
01532 
01533         rc = lstcon_ndlist_stat(&grp->grp_ndl_list, timeout, result_up);
01534 
01535         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01536 
01537         return rc;
01538 }
01539 
01540 int
01541 lstcon_nodes_stat(int count, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
01542                   int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01543 {
01544         lstcon_ndlink_t         *ndl;
01545         lstcon_group_t          *tmp;
01546         lnet_process_id_t        id;
01547         int                      i;
01548         int                      rc;
01549 
01550         rc = lstcon_group_alloc(NULL, &tmp);
01551         if (rc != 0) {
01552                 CERROR("Out of memory\n");
01553                 return -ENOMEM;
01554         }
01555 
01556         for (i = 0 ; i < count; i++) {
01557                 if (copy_from_user(&id, &ids_up[i], sizeof(id))) {
01558                         rc = -EFAULT;
01559                         break;
01560                 }
01561 
01562                 /* add to tmp group */
01563                 rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(tmp, id, &ndl, 2);
01564                 if (rc != 0) {
01565                         CDEBUG((rc == -ENOMEM) ? D_ERROR : D_NET,
01566                                "Failed to find or create %s: %d\n",
01567                                libcfs_id2str(id), rc);
01568                         break;
01569                 }
01570         }
01571 
01572         if (rc != 0) {
01573                 lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
01574                 return rc;
01575         }
01576 
01577         rc = lstcon_ndlist_stat(&tmp->grp_ndl_list, timeout, result_up);
01578 
01579         lstcon_group_decref(tmp);
01580 
01581         return rc;
01582 }
01583 
01584 static int
01585 lstcon_debug_ndlist(struct list_head *ndlist,
01586                     struct list_head *translist,
01587                     int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01588 {
01589         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01590         int                 rc;
01591 
01592         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(ndlist, translist, LST_TRANS_SESQRY,
01593                                      NULL, lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
01594         if (rc != 0) {
01595                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01596                 return rc;
01597         }
01598 
01599         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_VALIDATE_TIMEOUT(timeout));
01600 
01601         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(trans, result_up,
01602                                           lstcon_sesrpc_readent);
01603         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01604 
01605         return rc;
01606 }
01607 
01608 int
01609 lstcon_session_debug(int timeout, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01610 {
01611         return lstcon_debug_ndlist(&console_session.ses_ndl_list,
01612                                    NULL, timeout, result_up);
01613 }
01614 
01615 int
01616 lstcon_batch_debug(int timeout, char *name,
01617                    int client, struct list_head __user *result_up)
01618 {
01619         lstcon_batch_t *bat;
01620         int             rc;
01621 
01622         rc = lstcon_batch_find(name, &bat);
01623         if (rc != 0)
01624                 return -ENOENT;
01625 
01626         rc = lstcon_debug_ndlist(client ? &bat->bat_cli_list :
01627                                           &bat->bat_srv_list,
01628                                  NULL, timeout, result_up);
01629 
01630         return rc;
01631 }
01632 
01633 int
01634 lstcon_group_debug(int timeout, char *name,
01635                    struct list_head __user *result_up)
01636 {
01637         lstcon_group_t *grp;
01638         int             rc;
01639 
01640         rc = lstcon_group_find(name, &grp);
01641         if (rc != 0)
01642                 return -ENOENT;
01643 
01644         rc = lstcon_debug_ndlist(&grp->grp_ndl_list, NULL,
01645                                  timeout, result_up);
01646         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01647 
01648         return rc;
01649 }
01650 
01651 int
01652 lstcon_nodes_debug(int timeout,
01653                    int count, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids_up,
01654                    struct list_head __user *result_up)
01655 {
01656         lnet_process_id_t  id;
01657         lstcon_ndlink_t   *ndl;
01658         lstcon_group_t    *grp;
01659         int                i;
01660         int                rc;
01661 
01662         rc = lstcon_group_alloc(NULL, &grp);
01663         if (rc != 0) {
01664                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Out of memory\n");
01665                 return rc;
01666         }
01667 
01668         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
01669                 if (copy_from_user(&id, &ids_up[i], sizeof(id))) {
01670                         rc = -EFAULT;
01671                         break;
01672                 }
01673 
01674                 /* node is added to tmp group */
01675                 rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(grp, id, &ndl, 1);
01676                 if (rc != 0) {
01677                         CERROR("Can't create node link\n");
01678                         break;
01679                 }
01680         }
01681 
01682         if (rc != 0) {
01683                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01684                 return rc;
01685         }
01686 
01687         rc = lstcon_debug_ndlist(&grp->grp_ndl_list, NULL,
01688                                  timeout, result_up);
01689 
01690         lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01691 
01692         return rc;
01693 }
01694 
01695 int
01696 lstcon_session_match(lst_sid_t sid)
01697 {
01698         return (console_session.ses_id.ses_nid   == sid.ses_nid &&
01699                 console_session.ses_id.ses_stamp == sid.ses_stamp) ?  1: 0;
01700 }
01701 
01702 static void
01703 lstcon_new_session_id(lst_sid_t *sid)
01704 {
01705         lnet_process_id_t      id;
01706 
01707         LASSERT (console_session.ses_state == LST_SESSION_NONE);
01708 
01709         LNetGetId(1, &id);
01710         sid->ses_nid   = id.nid;
01711         sid->ses_stamp = cfs_time_current();
01712 }
01713 
01714 int
01715 lstcon_session_new(char *name, int key, unsigned feats,
01716                    int timeout, int force, lst_sid_t __user *sid_up)
01717 {
01718         int     rc = 0;
01719         int     i;
01720 
01721         if (console_session.ses_state != LST_SESSION_NONE) {
01722                 /* session exists */
01723                 if (!force) {
01724                         CNETERR("Session %s already exists\n",
01725                                 console_session.ses_name);
01726                         return -EEXIST;
01727                 }
01728 
01729                 rc = lstcon_session_end();
01730 
01731                 /* lstcon_session_end() only return local error */
01732                 if  (rc != 0)
01733                         return rc;
01734         }
01735 
01736         if ((feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) != 0) {
01737                 CNETERR("Unknown session features %x\n",
01738                         (feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK));
01739                 return -EINVAL;
01740         }
01741 
01742         for (i = 0; i < LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE; i++)
01743                 LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_ndl_hash[i]));
01744 
01745         lstcon_new_session_id(&console_session.ses_id);
01746 
01747         console_session.ses_key     = key;
01748         console_session.ses_state   = LST_SESSION_ACTIVE;
01749         console_session.ses_force   = !!force;
01750         console_session.ses_features = feats;
01751         console_session.ses_feats_updated = 0;
01752         console_session.ses_timeout = (timeout <= 0) ?
01753                                       LST_CONSOLE_TIMEOUT : timeout;
01754 
01755         if (strlen(name) > sizeof(console_session.ses_name)-1)
01756                 return -E2BIG;
01757         strlcpy(console_session.ses_name, name,
01758                 sizeof(console_session.ses_name));
01759 
01760         rc = lstcon_batch_add(LST_DEFAULT_BATCH);
01761         if (rc != 0)
01762                 return rc;
01763 
01764         rc = lstcon_rpc_pinger_start();
01765         if (rc != 0) {
01766                 lstcon_batch_t *bat = NULL;
01767 
01768                 lstcon_batch_find(LST_DEFAULT_BATCH, &bat);
01769                 lstcon_batch_destroy(bat);
01770 
01771                 return rc;
01772         }
01773 
01774         if (copy_to_user(sid_up, &console_session.ses_id,
01775                              sizeof(lst_sid_t)) == 0)
01776                 return rc;
01777 
01778         lstcon_session_end();
01779 
01780         return -EFAULT;
01781 }
01782 
01783 int
01784 lstcon_session_info(lst_sid_t __user *sid_up, int __user *key_up,
01785                     unsigned __user *featp,
01786                     lstcon_ndlist_ent_t __user *ndinfo_up,
01787                     char __user *name_up, int len)
01788 {
01789         lstcon_ndlist_ent_t *entp;
01790         lstcon_ndlink_t     *ndl;
01791         int                  rc = 0;
01792 
01793         if (console_session.ses_state != LST_SESSION_ACTIVE)
01794                 return -ESRCH;
01795 
01796         LIBCFS_ALLOC(entp, sizeof(*entp));
01797         if (entp == NULL)
01798                 return -ENOMEM;
01799 
01800         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &console_session.ses_ndl_list, ndl_link)
01801                 LST_NODE_STATE_COUNTER(ndl->ndl_node, entp);
01802 
01803         if (copy_to_user(sid_up, &console_session.ses_id,
01804                              sizeof(lst_sid_t)) ||
01805             copy_to_user(key_up, &console_session.ses_key,
01806                              sizeof(*key_up)) ||
01807             copy_to_user(featp, &console_session.ses_features,
01808                              sizeof(*featp)) ||
01809             copy_to_user(ndinfo_up, entp, sizeof(*entp)) ||
01810             copy_to_user(name_up, console_session.ses_name, len))
01811                 rc = -EFAULT;
01812 
01813         LIBCFS_FREE(entp, sizeof(*entp));
01814 
01815         return rc;
01816 }
01817 
01818 int
01819 lstcon_session_end()
01820 {
01821         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01822         lstcon_group_t     *grp;
01823         lstcon_batch_t     *bat;
01824         int                 rc = 0;
01825 
01826         LASSERT (console_session.ses_state == LST_SESSION_ACTIVE);
01827 
01828         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(&console_session.ses_ndl_list,
01829                                      NULL, LST_TRANS_SESEND, NULL,
01830                                      lstcon_sesrpc_condition, &trans);
01831         if (rc != 0) {
01832                 CERROR("Can't create transaction: %d\n", rc);
01833                 return rc;
01834         }
01835 
01836         console_session.ses_shutdown = 1;
01837 
01838         lstcon_rpc_pinger_stop();
01839 
01840         lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(trans, LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT);
01841 
01842         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01843         /* User can do nothing even rpc failed, so go on */
01844 
01845         /* waiting for orphan rpcs to die */
01846         lstcon_rpc_cleanup_wait();
01847 
01848         console_session.ses_id    = LST_INVALID_SID;
01849         console_session.ses_state = LST_SESSION_NONE;
01850         console_session.ses_key   = 0;
01851         console_session.ses_force = 0;
01852         console_session.ses_feats_updated = 0;
01853 
01854         /* destroy all batches */
01855         while (!list_empty(&console_session.ses_bat_list)) {
01856                 bat = list_entry(console_session.ses_bat_list.next,
01857                                  lstcon_batch_t, bat_link);
01858 
01859                 lstcon_batch_destroy(bat);
01860         }
01861 
01862         /* destroy all groups */
01863         while (!list_empty(&console_session.ses_grp_list)) {
01864                 grp = list_entry(console_session.ses_grp_list.next,
01865                                  lstcon_group_t, grp_link);
01866                 LASSERT(grp->grp_ref == 1);
01867 
01868                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01869         }
01870 
01871         /* all nodes should be released */
01872         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_ndl_list));
01873 
01874         console_session.ses_shutdown = 0;
01875         console_session.ses_expired  = 0;
01876 
01877         return rc;
01878 }
01879 
01880 int
01881 lstcon_session_feats_check(unsigned feats)
01882 {
01883         int rc = 0;
01884 
01885         if ((feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) != 0) {
01886                 CERROR("Can't support these features: %x\n",
01887                        (feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK));
01888                 return -EPROTO;
01889         }
01890 
01891         spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
01892 
01893         if (!console_session.ses_feats_updated) {
01894                 console_session.ses_feats_updated = 1;
01895                 console_session.ses_features = feats;
01896         }
01897 
01898         if (console_session.ses_features != feats)
01899                 rc = -EPROTO;
01900 
01901         spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
01902 
01903         if (rc != 0) {
01904                 CERROR("remote features %x do not match with "
01905                        "session features %x of console\n",
01906                        feats, console_session.ses_features);
01907         }
01908 
01909         return rc;
01910 }
01911 
01912 static int
01913 lstcon_acceptor_handle (srpc_server_rpc_t *rpc)
01914 {
01915         srpc_msg_t        *rep  = &rpc->srpc_replymsg;
01916         srpc_msg_t        *req  = &rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg;
01917         srpc_join_reqst_t *jreq = &req->msg_body.join_reqst;
01918         srpc_join_reply_t *jrep = &rep->msg_body.join_reply;
01919         lstcon_group_t    *grp  = NULL;
01920         lstcon_ndlink_t   *ndl;
01921         int                rc   = 0;
01922 
01923         sfw_unpack_message(req);
01924 
01925         mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01926 
01927         jrep->join_sid = console_session.ses_id;
01928 
01929         if (console_session.ses_id.ses_nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
01930                 jrep->join_status = ESRCH;
01931                 goto out;
01932         }
01933 
01934         if (lstcon_session_feats_check(req->msg_ses_feats) != 0) {
01935                 jrep->join_status = EPROTO;
01936                 goto out;
01937         }
01938 
01939         if (jreq->join_sid.ses_nid != LNET_NID_ANY &&
01940              !lstcon_session_match(jreq->join_sid)) {
01941                 jrep->join_status = EBUSY;
01942                 goto out;
01943         }
01944 
01945         if (lstcon_group_find(jreq->join_group, &grp) != 0) {
01946                 rc = lstcon_group_alloc(jreq->join_group, &grp);
01947                 if (rc != 0) {
01948                         CERROR("Out of memory\n");
01949                         goto out;
01950                 }
01951 
01952                 list_add_tail(&grp->grp_link,
01953                               &console_session.ses_grp_list);
01954                 lstcon_group_addref(grp);
01955         }
01956 
01957         if (grp->grp_ref > 2) {
01958                 /* Group in using */
01959                 jrep->join_status = EBUSY;
01960                 goto out;
01961         }
01962 
01963         rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(grp, rpc->srpc_peer, &ndl, 0);
01964         if (rc == 0) {
01965                 jrep->join_status = EEXIST;
01966                 goto out;
01967         }
01968 
01969         rc = lstcon_group_ndlink_find(grp, rpc->srpc_peer, &ndl, 1);
01970         if (rc != 0) {
01971                 CERROR("Out of memory\n");
01972                 goto out;
01973         }
01974 
01975         ndl->ndl_node->nd_state   = LST_NODE_ACTIVE;
01976         ndl->ndl_node->nd_timeout = console_session.ses_timeout;
01977 
01978         if (grp->grp_userland == 0)
01979                 grp->grp_userland = 1;
01980 
01981         strlcpy(jrep->join_session, console_session.ses_name,
01982                 sizeof(jrep->join_session));
01983         jrep->join_timeout = console_session.ses_timeout;
01984         jrep->join_status  = 0;
01985 
01986 out:
01987         rep->msg_ses_feats = console_session.ses_features;
01988         if (grp != NULL)
01989                 lstcon_group_decref(grp);
01990 
01991         mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01992 
01993         return rc;
01994 }
01995 
01996 static srpc_service_t lstcon_acceptor_service;
01997 static void lstcon_init_acceptor_service(void)
01998 {
01999         /* initialize selftest console acceptor service table */
02000         lstcon_acceptor_service.sv_name    = "join session";
02001         lstcon_acceptor_service.sv_handler = lstcon_acceptor_handle;
02002         lstcon_acceptor_service.sv_id      = SRPC_SERVICE_JOIN;
02003         lstcon_acceptor_service.sv_wi_total = SFW_FRWK_WI_MAX;
02004 }
02005 
02006 int lstcon_ioctl_entry(unsigned int cmd, struct libcfs_ioctl_hdr *hdr);
02007 
02008 DECLARE_IOCTL_HANDLER(lstcon_ioctl_handler, lstcon_ioctl_entry);
02009 
02010 /* initialize console */
02011 int
02012 lstcon_console_init(void)
02013 {
02014         int     i;
02015         int     rc;
02016 
02017         memset(&console_session, 0, sizeof(lstcon_session_t));
02018 
02019         console_session.ses_id              = LST_INVALID_SID;
02020         console_session.ses_state           = LST_SESSION_NONE;
02021         console_session.ses_timeout         = 0;
02022         console_session.ses_force           = 0;
02023         console_session.ses_expired         = 0;
02024         console_session.ses_feats_updated   = 0;
02025         console_session.ses_features        = LST_FEATS_MASK;
02026         console_session.ses_laststamp       = cfs_time_current_sec();
02027 
02028         mutex_init(&console_session.ses_mutex);
02029 
02030         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_ndl_list);
02031         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_grp_list);
02032         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_bat_list);
02033         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_trans_list);
02034 
02035         LIBCFS_ALLOC(console_session.ses_ndl_hash,
02036                      sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE);
02037         if (console_session.ses_ndl_hash == NULL)
02038                 return -ENOMEM;
02039 
02040         for (i = 0; i < LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE; i++)
02041                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_ndl_hash[i]);
02042 
02043 
02044         /* initialize acceptor service table */
02045         lstcon_init_acceptor_service();
02046 
02047         rc = srpc_add_service(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02048         LASSERT(rc != -EBUSY);
02049         if (rc != 0) {
02050                 LIBCFS_FREE(console_session.ses_ndl_hash,
02051                             sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE);
02052                 return rc;
02053         }
02054 
02055         rc = srpc_service_add_buffers(&lstcon_acceptor_service,
02056                                       lstcon_acceptor_service.sv_wi_total);
02057         if (rc != 0) {
02058                 rc = -ENOMEM;
02059                 goto out;
02060         }
02061 
02062         rc = libcfs_register_ioctl(&lstcon_ioctl_handler);
02063 
02064         if (rc == 0) {
02065                 lstcon_rpc_module_init();
02066                 return 0;
02067         }
02068 
02069 out:
02070         srpc_shutdown_service(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02071         srpc_remove_service(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02072 
02073         LIBCFS_FREE(console_session.ses_ndl_hash,
02074                     sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE);
02075 
02076         srpc_wait_service_shutdown(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02077 
02078         return rc;
02079 }
02080 
02081 int
02082 lstcon_console_fini(void)
02083 {
02084         int     i;
02085 
02086         libcfs_deregister_ioctl(&lstcon_ioctl_handler);
02087 
02088         mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
02089 
02090         srpc_shutdown_service(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02091         srpc_remove_service(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02092 
02093         if (console_session.ses_state != LST_SESSION_NONE)
02094                 lstcon_session_end();
02095 
02096         lstcon_rpc_module_fini();
02097 
02098         mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
02099 
02100         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_ndl_list));
02101         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_grp_list));
02102         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_bat_list));
02103         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_trans_list));
02104 
02105         for (i = 0; i < LST_NODE_HASHSIZE; i++)
02106                 LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_ndl_hash[i]));
02107 
02108         LIBCFS_FREE(console_session.ses_ndl_hash,
02109                     sizeof(struct list_head) * LST_GLOBAL_HASHSIZE);
02110 
02111         srpc_wait_service_shutdown(&lstcon_acceptor_service);
02112 
02113         return 0;
02114 }
